question: What are the main tasks of an ICT Project Manager?
gold_citation: Manages the entire lifecycle of ICT projects, including initiation, planning, execution, monitoring and closure
gold_answer: An ICT Project Manager oversees the full project lifecycle—from initiation and planning to execution, monitoring and closure—ensuring resources, risks, quality and deliverables are managed within agreed timelines and budgets.

question: What are the main tasks of an ICT Business Analyst?
gold_citation: Gathers requirements from stakeholders to define business, technical and functional needs and specifications of a project
gold_answer: An ICT Business Analyst gathers and documents requirements from stakeholders, analyses business processes and system specifications, and liaises with developers and users to ensure ICT solutions meet business needs.

question: What are the responsibilities of a Cloud Architect?
gold_citation: Designs, develops and manages scalable, reliable and secure cloud infrastructure for an organisation
gold_answer: A Cloud Architect designs and manages scalable, secure and reliable cloud infrastructures, selects appropriate cloud platforms, and oversees migration, capacity planning and disaster recovery strategies.

question: What is the primary duty of an ICT Service Delivery Manager?
gold_citation: Manages end-to-end ICT service delivery, ensuring adherence to agreed service levels and customer satisfaction
gold_answer: An ICT Service Delivery Manager ensures ICT services are delivered effectively according to service level agreements, monitors performance metrics, manages incidents, and coordinates with vendors to maintain customer satisfaction.

question: What kind of work does a Digital Game Developer perform?
gold_citation: Develops and creates game ideas and translates creative concepts into functional digital game prototypes
gold_answer: A Digital Game Developer designs and codes games from concept to prototype, implements gameplay mechanics, optimises performance across platforms, and tests for bugs and user experience quality.

question: What are the core duties of a Web Developer?
gold_citation: Designs, develops and maintains websites using various programming languages
gold_answer: A Web Developer designs, codes, and maintains websites using web technologies, ensures accessibility and performance, manages databases, and collaborates with analysts and designers to meet user requirements.

question: What tasks does a Solution Architect handle?
gold_citation: Designs and develops scalable, efficient, secure and cost-effective technical solutions to meet business infrastructure or functional needs
gold_answer: A Solution Architect creates scalable and cost-effective technical architectures, defines interfaces and data flows, selects technologies, and coordinates development teams to implement end-to-end solutions.

question: What is the main responsibility of a Systems Analyst?
gold_citation: Analyses existing business processes and systems to identify issues, errors and areas for improvement
gold_answer: A Systems Analyst evaluates and improves ICT systems, collaborates with users to define requirements, develops functional specifications, and ensures system modifications meet performance and quality goals.

question: What are the main tasks of an ICT Network and Systems Engineer?
gold_citation: Builds, implements, monitors and maintains computer networks and systems
gold_answer: An ICT Network and Systems Engineer builds, implements, monitors and maintains computer networks and systems; ensures performance and security; configures and installs hardware/software; develops and documents procedures; and provides technical support for network and system issues.

question: What is the role of an ICT Business Development Manager?
gold_citation: Develops and executes strategic business plans to promote existing and new ICT goods and services
gold_answer: An ICT Business Development Manager identifies and generates new ICT business opportunities, promotes goods and services to clients, researches market trends, and manages strategic business plans to grow market share.
